name: Verify Manager can remove User from organization
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.
- Signup `third user`.
- Invite `third user` to organization with `User` role via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` can remove `User` from organization.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.
  • Signup third user.
  • Invite third user to organization with User role via API.

Verify that:

  • Manager can remove User from organization.
